messages.content: He knew what you meant. He pretended to be confused to save face. that’s disgusting...
[NAME] is such a disgusting champ to play against ....
I've tried the "peanut butter"...I almost vomited. NASTY! It went straight to the trash.
A horrendous amount of Sesame oil, god, that would be awful.
It smelled even worse than it sounds. You learn just how quickly someone's feet can rot and really stink up an entire bay.
Submissive? "she’s a [NAME] so literally it’s like a brand new car [NAME] has blessed me with." You're disgusting.
These were one of the worst commentators I have ever been forced to listen to. The jokes were so cringe-worthy.
And I thought Honda Civics smell bad on the outside!
Yeah, without the music that scene would have been much worse.
I've always found it weird how popular Nandos is in Britain.
This is garbage. No. My garbage has more compositional worth than this. Hipster pepto bismol vomit looking trash.
I think a [NAME] government would be far far worse than Brexit.
Weird as I do know I've seen CoC waste/recycling services trucks picking up bins as early as 6:30AM.
This is some of the worst passing I've ever seen.
How offensive. I, am NOT a duck!
I don't think playing with her hair would work. Thats just creepy.
Right its not because they look ugly but their personality is ugly. That’s what’s driving everyone away.
Trier is low key an awful defender
Boner. I'd have the weirdest boner.
